Mules w/Ribbon (Blue, Women)
kDesc
Thick-soled mules with blue straps and attention-grabbing light blue ribbons. [#Legal]
Des mules à semelle épaisse, brides bleues et nœuds bleu clair qui attirent l'attention. [#Legal]
Strand-Schlappen mit blauen Riemen, dicken Sohlen und Aufsehen erregenden türkisen Schleifen. [#Legal]
Sandali con zeppa alta, cinghie blu e vistosi fiocchi azzurri. [#Legal]
Unas sandalias de plataforma con correas azules y unos llamativos lazos azul claro. [#Legal]
水色のリボンが目を引く、厚底の青いストラップミュール。[#Legal]
하늘색의 리본이 눈길을 끄는, 파란색 스트랩의 통굽 뮬.[#Legal]
Thick-soled mules with blue straps and attention-grabbing light blue ribbons. [#Legal]
厚底的藍色有帶無後跟拖鞋，附有奪目的水藍色蝴蝶結。[#Legal]
